p: RE GHG,ppbv is the radiative efficiency in units of W m −2 ppbv −1, M A is the mean molar mass of air, M GHG is the molar mass of the greenhouse gas, and T M is the total mass of the atmosphere. Parameter values and descriptions are available in Supplementary Table 5. Results and figures corresponding to those available in the main text are displayed in Supplementary Table 6 and Supplementary Figure 6.
